final_state.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Bob was found dead this morning.
Diana: I'm suspicious of Charlie's sudden silence during the discussion. Let's keep a close eye on him.
You said: I find Diana's suspicions interesting. Let's focus on ensuring everyone feels at ease and trusts each other. We can work together to uncover any hidden intentions.
Charlie: I agree with Alice, let's focus on building trust and ensuring a peaceful day ahead. Let's discuss our favorite hobbies or shared experiences to get to know each other better.
You said: Let's continue building trust and share our favorite hobbies or memories. This will help us understand each other better and strengthen our bond as a team.
Diana: I'd love to share a memory of a fun team project we completed together. Let's continue fostering trust and unity.

Charlie: I'd like to share a memory of a fun team project we completed together, it involved solving a challenging puzzle and I learned a lot from everyone's unique perspectives. Let's continue building...
Day 1: Charlie was arrested (mafioso)
